metadata.title: CVE-2023-35131 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Content on the groups page required additional sanitizing to prevent an XSSrisk. This flaw affects Moodle versions 4.2, 4.1 to 4.1.3, 4.0 to 4.0.8 and3.11 to 3.11.14.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
